text: James F. Pasquarette (born 1961) is a lieutenant general in the United States Army, who serves as the deputy Chief of Staff of the Army G-8, previously serving as Deputy Commanding General of U.S. Army, Pacific.https://www.army.mil/article/211350/new_g_8_embraces_streamlining_tech_acquisition He is a graduate of Furman University and was commissioned in 1983.https://www.usarpac.army.mil/dcgPasquarette.asp ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births
title: James Pasquarette
